name: Cake's Dad
description: Begin by going to Starter Place, check near the huge tree for a hint. Then, go to Timber Peaks, in search of a key. All of this shall lead you to a perilous paradox.
hint: Begin by going to Starter Place, check near the huge tree for a hint. Then, go to Timber Peaks, in search of a key. All of this shall lead you to a perilous paradox.
